Quality Education.reason: 課程內容主要為向同學介紹基礎統計模型；課程目標與學習成效。
evidence: 課程內容主要為向同學介紹基礎統計模型，包含常見之離散與連續型機率分佈，並引入機率空間介紹事件發生之機率與隨機變數之關聯性。
後在獨立性假設下，介紹隨機樣本在常態或非常態模型下之有限樣本或大樣本性質，作為下學期統計推論方法學習之基礎。
課程目標與學習成效

No Poverty.reason: The course aims for students to 'identify sustainability issues,' which broadly includes poverty, but the statistical content doesn't directly address it.
evidence: 理解與辨別道德、社會責任與永續議題(Students will understand and be able to identify ethics, social responsibility, and sustainability issues.)

gpt_critique.critique: Model B correctly emphasizes SDG4 given explicit course focus on foundational knowledge and problem solving; other SDGs lack explicit support.

Quality Education.reason: Course explicitly targets core competencies aligned with SDG4; infers broader sustainability issues are not explicitly covered.

gemini_critique.critique: Model B's stricter interpretation of direct evidence is more appropriate for this technical course. My previous reliance on a general 'sustainability issues' competence was too broad without specific course content links.
